bash

uvicorn excuse_api:app --reload

This forces FastAPI to reload your fresh . env.

2. Trigger the error again while watching logs
+ Keep that uvicorn tab visible.
+ Ina second terminal tab run the same curl:

bash

curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/generate \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"scenario":"missed class", "urgency":"panic"}!

+ The uvicorn tab will print a red traceback.
Read the last 2-3 lines—they usually say something like:

oOpenai.NotFoundError: The model 'gpt-4o-mini' does not exist

or

openai.AuthenticationError: Incorrect API key provided
